main event: A large, silver-colored unidentified flying object was sighted over Mellette, South Dakota in March 1961.
interesting points: The object remained in the sky for several minutes before suddenly disappearing.
The sighting was witnessed by Mrs. Melette and her husband and son.
The report was part of Project 10073, a government program documenting UFO sightings.
The case was evaluated as an unreliable report, with the witness likely distorting her impressions.
There was no evidence to support the claim that the object shot down jets or caused an atomic blast.
sighted object: A large, silver-colored unidentified flying object
witnesses: Mrs. Melette, her husband, and her son
